name: Idam Obiahu
tagline: Computer Engineer – Music Fan – Tech Enthusiast
body:
# Welcome To The Circus of My Mind
Personally, I have never really been good at art. When I was younger, I would spend hour after hour attempting to make, at least, one decent piece of art. However, I don't think I was ever successful. I had long given up on the pursuit of *traditional* artistic excellence, when I was introduced to a new type of art. Computer Programming. Technology has opened a door to convert my dreams to reality. Curious? *Step into the circus of my mind...*

***
